mapper.sql: business_name , pouring_position, pouring_method, quantities, number_of_vehicles,strength_grade, unit_price_of_concrete, freight, total_amount, remarks, pour_price, strength_price
mapper.insert: insert into business_detials (,business_date, isminflag, busid) values (#{business_name}, #{pouring_position}, #{pouring_method}, #{quantities}, #{number_of_vehicles}, #{strength_grade}, #{unit_price_of_concrete}, #{freight}, #{total_amount}, #{remarks},#{pour_price},#{strength_price}, #{business_date}, #{isminflag}, #{busid})
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(quantities),0) from business_detials where business_name = #{busName} and business_date = #{busDate} and pouring_method = #{pouring_method}
mapper.update: update business_detials set pour_price = #{pour_price}, unit_price_of_concrete = #{unit_price_of_concrete}, total_amount = #{total_amount}, isminflag = #{isminflag} where busid = #{busid}
mapper.select: select 1 from business_detials where business_name = #{busName} and business_date = #{busDate} and pouring_method = #{pouring_method} and isminflag = '1'
